title: Women World Cup 2023 LIVE : France defeat Brazil in thriller and Keira Walsh injury latest
body_text:
Women‚Äôs World Cup 2023 LIVE: France defeat Brazil in thriller and Keira Walsh injury latest
France claimed a vital three points at the Women‚Äôs World Cup as they defeated Brazil 2-1 in a thrilling group-stage clash in Brisbane. Captain Wendie Renard‚Äôs late winner earned France their first victory at the tournament as they took top spot in Group F following their opening draw against Jamaica.
Brazil equalised through Debinha following Eugenie Le Sommer‚Äôs opener, but Renard‚Äôs header at the back post earned France a crucial victory that gives Les Bleues breathing space and sees them take control of their hopes of reaching the knockout stages. Brazil will now need to beat Jamaica on the final day after the Reggae Girlz claimed their first-ever Women‚Äôs World Cup win, defeating Panama 1-0 in Perth.
Meanwhile, England received a boost with the news that midfielder Keira Walsh did not suffer an anterior cruciate ligament injury against Denmark. Walsh will remain with the Lionesses squad, but has been ruled out of the final group match against China.
Australia captain Sam Kerr also confirmed she will be available for the Matildas‚Äô final group stage encounter with Canada after missing their first two Women‚Äôs World Cup matches with a calf injury.
Elsewhere at the Women‚Äôs World Cup, Sweden put five past Italy to book their place in the knockout stages, with defender Amanda Ilestedt scoring twice to take her to three goals for the tournament overall.
Follow the latest World Cup scores, updates and news in today‚Äôs live blog:
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Latest updates
The Women‚Äôs World Cup continues in Australia and New Zealand
England confirm Keira Walsh did not suffer ACL injury against Denmark
France defeat Brazil in thriller to take charge of Group F
Jamaica earn first ever Women‚Äôs World Cup win against Panama
Superb Sweden thrash Italy 5-0 to book place in knockout stages
Sam Kerr to return from calf injury for Australia‚Äôs must-win clash with Canada
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:41 , Jamie Braidwood
A day that Jamaica will never forget! And what a boost it will be to have Bunny Shaw back for their final match against Brazil.
FT: #PAN 0-1 #JAM
üáØüá≤ Jamaica's historic first-ever win at a #FIFAWWC sees them leapfrog Brazil in Group F, who they face in their their group stage finale ü§©#FIFAWWC pic.twitter.com/HIdxTtmXup‚Äî ITV Football (@itvfootball) July 29, 2023
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:29 , Jamie Braidwood
History for Jamaica! They hold on to earn their first ever Women‚Äôs World Cup win, a result which ends Panama‚Äôs hopes of reaching the last-16.
Allyson Swaby scored the winner for the Reggae Girlz - a remarkable story given the team had to crowd-fund their way to Australia for the tournament.
It means that Jamaica overtake Brazil in second place in Group F and they can qualify for the knockout stages if they take a point against the South American side.
It keeps the dream alive...
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:24 , Jamie Braidwood
90+4 mins: Hang on... after a VAR check, the decision is no penalty! That‚Äôs a very strange decision to overturn that - but it gives Panama hope with maybe five minutes of added time left to play.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:21 , Jamie Braidwood
90+1 mins: PENALTY FOR JAMAICA! A chance to seal the three points right at the death, after a handball is awarded! The shot from the edge of the box struck Wendy Natis as she turned her back on the ball.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:12 , Jamie Braidwood
81 mins: Panama have had as much of the possession as Jamaica, and have had more passes, but they‚Äôve struggled to turn that into chances. Jamaica have had nine shots on target to their three - despite Marta Cox‚Äôs drive from midfield they are really missing some attacking quality.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 15:01 , Jamie Braidwood
71 mins: This would be a historic victory for Jamaica - before today they had not even led in a World Cup game, let alone won one.
Panama have offered very little since falling behind - as it stands, they will be out if they are unable to turn this around.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:50 , Jamie Braidwood
61 mins: What a moment for Jamaica!
Lift off for #JAM üöÄ
The Jamaican bench goes wild as Allyson Swaby gets on the end of a wicked corner ball!#FIFAWWC pic.twitter.com/F0UlPOAYqj‚Äî ITV Football (@itvfootball) July 29, 2023
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-1 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:46 , Jamie Braidwood
Breakthrough for Jamaica! What an important moment this could be - and it‚Äôs the captain who scores their first goal at this World Cup! Allyson Swaby is there to flick a header across goal and into the net from a free kick - Bunny Shaw has a beaming smile on the touchline!
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama 0-0 Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:42 , Jamie Braidwood
We‚Äôre back underway in Perth. Jamaica went closest during the first half with Drew Spence threatening - but the Reggae Girlz are really missing Bunny Shaw, which isn‚Äôt a surprise. Can they find the goal they need to leapfrog Brazil into second place?
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama vs Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:21 , Harry Latham-Coyle
The referee peeps in Perth, where it is scoreless with Jamaica struggling to break Panama down and the Central American side growing into it, creating a couple of chances just before the interval. Off for some half-time oranges - it feels like the sort of encounter that could be settled by a single goal. How Jamaica would love to have Khadija Shaw available.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Keira Walsh avoids ACL tear
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:13 , Harry Latham-Coyle
We await further news about the severity of Walsh‚Äôs injury, but if there‚Äôs even a half chance of the midfielder being available for the backend of the tournament, England will surely give Walsh every opportunity at fighting back to full fitness. Jamie Braidwood explains why Walsh is close to irreplaceable:
Why Keira Walsh is irreplaceable for England
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Keira Walsh avoids ACL tear
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:05 , Harry Latham-Coyle
England midfielder Keira Walsh did not suffer an anterior cruciate ligament injury against Denmark but has been ruled out of the Lionesses‚Äô final group match against China at the Women‚Äôs World Cup.
Walsh was stretchered off in the Lionesses‚Äô 1-0 win against Denmark and there were fears that the 26-year-old had become the latest star in women‚Äôs football to suffer an ACL injury that has ruled captain Leah Williamson and Beth Mead out of the tournament.
The Barcelona midfielder was left on crutches after stretching for the ball and catching her studs on the turf, but a scan on Saturday afternoon revealed that the injury was not as bad as it first looked and there was no serious ligament damage.
England confirm Keira Walsh injury in Women‚Äôs World Cup update
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama vs Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 14:00 , Harry Latham-Coyle
Still goalless in Perth, with Jamaica dominating possession but unable to force too many clearcut chances in the opening half-hour, although Atlanta Primus has just flashed one over the crossbar. It sounds a lively atmosphere in Western Australia, these two sides seeking a first Women‚Äôs World Cup win.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Panama vs Jamaica
Saturday 29 July 2023 13:41 , Jamie Braidwood
The Group F action continues as Panama face Jamaica in Perth.
A Jamaica win would make things very interesting: after their opening draw with France, three points against Panama would see them overtake Brazil for second spot in Group F ahead of their meeting on the final day. If that was the case, Jamaica would only need to draw to advance.
Panama look like they have a harder task following their opening 4-0 defeat to Brazil - but Jamaica are without their star striker Khadija ‚ÄòBunny‚Äô Shaw after the Man City forward was sent off late on against the French.
It‚Äôs underway and goalless so far.
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 2-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 13:31 , Jamie Braidwood
France are now top of Group F with four points from their first two games, with Brazil remaining on three. That means they will be in control of their own fate when they face Panama on the final day - it would have been a very different story had Brazil found the winner they threatened to score in the second half.
You can feel the relief.
BREAKING: England provide Keira Walsh update
Saturday 29 July 2023 13:03 , Jamie Braidwood
England midfielder Keira Walsh did not suffer an anterior cruciate ligament injury against Denmark but has been ruled out of the Lionesses‚Äô final group match against China at the Women‚Äôs World Cup.
Walsh was stretchered off in the Lionesses‚Äô 1-0 win against Denmark and there were fears that the 26-year-old had become the latest star in women‚Äôs football to suffer an ACL injury that has ruled captain Leah Williamson and Beth Mead out of the tournament.
The Barcelona midfielder was left on crutches after stretching for the ball and catching her studs on the turf, but a scan on Saturday afternoon revealed that the injury was not as bad as it first looked and there was no serious ligament damage.
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 2-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 13:00 , Jamie Braidwood
Renard‚Äôs goal is enough! That is a huge win for France and a crushing blow for Brazil.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 2-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:54 , Jamie Braidwood
Can France hold on? This would be such an important win, and will leave Brazil needing to avoid defeat against Jamaica on the final day.
That's a huge goal for France! üá´üá∑üôå
Wendie Renard heads home at the back post üò†üí•‚öΩ#FIFAWWC #FRA #BRA pic.twitter.com/EcBxLAhcUs‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 2-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:44 , Jamie Braidwood
HUGE GOAL FOR FRANCE FROM WENDIE RENARD!
The France captain is left unmarked from a corner and plants a powerful header back across goal and into the net!
Terrible marking from Brazil, you simply cannot afford to let Renard have that much space from set-pieces!
But what a massive moment for France with just 10 minutes to go.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:39 , Jamie Braidwood
77 mins: Karchaoui makes a brilliant run from left back but her pass through to Becho is overhit - France have not really threatened since half time.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:35 , Jamie Braidwood
73 mins: Chance! A free kick is whipped towards the near post by Debinha, but Kerolin is unable to flick it on target! France suddenly look very nervy.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:30 , Jamie Braidwood
69 mins: After a frantic passage of play, Karchaoui is the latest to go into the book after hauling down her opposite number Andressa Alves. Brazil are playing with real belief again.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:27 , Jamie Braidwood
65 mins: There‚Äôs a real tension to the contest now - the match brilliantly poised. France substitute Becho curls an effort at goal that is palmed over by Izidoro.
Brazil then had the chance to counter but Debinha couldn‚Äôt find the pass!
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:24 , Jamie Braidwood
What a touch from Debinha - it‚Äôs given Brazil life again.
üáßüá∑ Brazil have their equaliser! ‚öΩ
Debinha delivers with a composed finish for the South Americans üôå#FIFAWWC #FRA #BRA pic.twitter.com/B56n8dGOWC‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-1 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:18 , Jamie Braidwood
BUT NOW BRAZIL DO RESPOND!
And it‚Äôs Debinha! It‚Äôs a lucky break, after Kerolin‚Äôs shot is block and falls to the striker, but the finish from there to guide the ball into the far corner is superb!
We‚Äôre level in Brisbane!
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:17 , Jamie Braidwood
55 mins: The start of the second half has been scrappy, which suits France but is a shame for the rest of us after the end-to-end first period. This is a proper examination of Brazil now, and they are yet to respond to it.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:13 , Jamie Braidwood
50 mins: France have taken control again at the start of the half. They are winning the midfield battle and Le Sommer is almost slipped in, but Lauren is able to sweep up at the back.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 12:08 , Jamie Braidwood
Back underway! It won‚Äôt be long, surely, until we see Marta come on for Brazil.
HALF TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:54 , Jamie Braidwood
France lead thanks to Le Sommer‚Äôs header and as it stands they are heading for a crucial win in Group F. Les Bleues have been so much better today than in their opening draw against Jamaica, and have controlled Brazil well while exploiting some of their weaknesses. Brazil, who were so vibrant against Panama, have struggled to spark their attack into life. Brazil haven‚Äôt beaten France in 11 matches, and that record looks to be weighing over them.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:49 , Jamie Braidwood
45 mins: There will be three minutes added on - as it stands, France will be very happy with their position at the break.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:47 , Jamie Braidwood
42 mins: Brazil are able to clear after an awkrward moment when dealing with a France free-kick into the box. Brazil then come down the other end and get their first shot on target as Ant√¥nia shoots from distance - it would have taken something extraordinary to score from there. It flies straight at Pauline Peyraud Magnin.
Luana is then booked for crunching into Toletti, with the France midfielder staying down for a moment.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:43 , Jamie Braidwood
38 mins: Geyse has been quiet today after getting a start alongside Debinha - she concedes a foul after a shove on Renard following a ball into the box, which does not seem like the best strategy against this France defence.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:38 , Jamie Braidwood
Here‚Äôs the moment that gave France the lead.
An opening goal for France! üá´üá∑
Eugenie le Sommer scores a superb header ‚öΩ#FIFAWWC #FRA #BRA pic.twitter.com/g56qCJjre1‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:37 , Jamie Braidwood
32 mins: This Group F clash has really lived up to the hype so far - even with France a goal up, it remains wide open and it feels like either an equaliser or a France second could come at any time.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:32 , Jamie Braidwood
26 mins: France have been the better team but Brazil are carrying so much threat on the counter-attack, when they are able to play through the first line of the Brazil press. Adriana carries it into the France half before she is chopped down by Sandie Toletti, who is booked. Debinha wastes the free kick.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:27 , Jamie Braidwood
23 mins: CHANCE! It should be 1-1! Such brilliant feet from Debinha, who wriggles away from Renard before setting up Adriana. The chance falls 12 yards out, central, but Adriana blazes it high and wide!
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 1-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:19 , Jamie Braidwood
LE SOMMER!
France strike first through their record goalscorer - and it had been coming! It‚Äôs a great move: Karchaoui lifts a ball to the back post and picks out Diani, who nods it across to Le Sommer to open the scoring.
That‚Äôs the striker‚Äôs 90th goal for France - and after being left out of their squad for the Euros last summer under Corinne Diacre, the Lyon star is back with a bang!
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:18 , Jamie Braidwood
15 mins: Brazil get their first attempt on goal from a long-range free kick. Adriana sends a powerful drive spinning wide of the post - a good hit, but always drifting wide.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:16 , Jamie Braidwood
12 mins: Save! This is so much better from France - Tamires is getting overwhelmed at left back for Brazil, another cross comes in and Le Sommer‚Äôs header back across goal looks to be sneaking into the far corner, but goalkeeper Izidoro claws it out.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:14 , Jamie Braidwood
10 mins: Kenza Dali goes straight into the book after a crunching tackle on Tamires - the first yellow of the game. Brazil have yet to settle.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:10 , Jamie Braidwood
7 mins: France have started brightly - just what they needed. Sakina Karchaoui makes a bursting run into the box and is goes down under Ant√¥nia, but there‚Äôs not enough contact there for a penalty.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:08 , Jamie Braidwood
5 mins: France are able to get round the sides again, this time with Diani popping up on the right. The cross is pulled back but the shot from the edge of the box by Toletti is easily saved.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:06 , Jamie Braidwood
3 mins: Chance! Le Sommer is played through and has an opportunity to square for Diani, but plays it behind the PSG star. Le Sommer was offside in the build-up, however. Better from France, though, who barely got behind Jamaica at all in their opening draw.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France 0-0 Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 11:03 , Jamie Braidwood
KICK-OFF! France get us underway - the stadium in Brisbane is packed, with loads of bright yellow Brazil shirts in the stands.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France vs Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:57 , Jamie Braidwood
Here we go! This should be fun - but it‚Äôs also a huge match for France. Should they lose to an in-form Brazil side and they will be in serious danger of failing to reach the knockout stages.
On the other hand, it‚Äôs a great opportunity for Brazil to show that they can be contenders under Pia Sundhage.
France and Brazil are just special names to see at the World Cup - and this is a real heavyweight contest in the group stages.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France vs Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:52 , Jamie Braidwood
There are loads of star names on display here - but Brazil icon Marta is again on the bench. The 37-year-old is looking to become the first player in World Cup history to score at six tournaments - a feat no player has achieved, men‚Äôs or women‚Äôs.
Brazil have never beaten France in 11 attempts- that includes a 2-1 defeat in extra time in the last 16 of the World Cup in 2019.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France vs Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:40 , Jamie Braidwood
Brazil are full of confidence after their dazzling 4-0 win opening against tournament debutants Panama, and another win here would assure the South Americans a last 16 spot.
‚ÄúThe team is loud, there is a lot of confidence,‚Äù Brazil coach Pia Sundhage said. ‚ÄúNot conceding goals is very important but, at the end of the day, it will be more important to score goals against France.
‚ÄúTo put away our chances is what it is all about. If you do that and get a goal, the self-confidence and the team spirit will be very different and they will continue to play the way we want to play.‚Äù
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 5-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:34 , Jamie Braidwood
A stunning way for Sweden to wrap up an eye-catching performance. Does this put down a marker for the rest of the tournament?
That's the cherry on the cake! üçí
Rebecka Blomqvist finishes a speedy breakaway from Sweden to complete a five-star performance üá∏üá™‚≠ê#FIFAWWC #SWE #ITA pic.twitter.com/4CAVmvFPn2‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
FULL TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 5-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:30 , Jamie Braidwood
Sweden advance to the knockout stages with an emphatic victory against Italy, who fell apart as Sweden scored a flurry of goals late in the first half.
That is Sweden‚Äôs biggest World Cup victory since 1991.
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 5-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:28 , Jamie Braidwood
WHAT A WAY TO FINISH! Rebecka Blomqvist scores a stunning individual goal after starting from just inside her own half - she nutmegs the Italy defender, races clear, and then produces a composed finish to add Sweden‚Äôs fifth.
A five-star performance from the Olympic silver medalists.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 4-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:25 , Jamie Braidwood
90 mins: Into six minutes of added time for a contest that was over a long time ago. Goal difference could be a factor on the final day, should Argentina beat Sweden and Italy draw to South Africa, so this could be a costly evening for the Italians...
But as long as Italy don‚Äôt lose to South Africa and better Argentina‚Äôs result against Sweden, they should be fine.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 4-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:13 , Jamie Braidwood
75 mins: Understandably, Italy have just been flattened by Sweden‚Äôs flurry of goals either side of the half-time break. Sweden are meanwhile taking the chance to rest some legs ahead of facing Argentina in their final fixture.
As it stands, they would just need a draw to be sure of top spot in Group G. That would put them against the runners-up of Group E, which will be one of the USA, Netherlands or Portugal...
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: France vs Brazil
Saturday 29 July 2023 10:07 , Jamie Braidwood
The big news ahead of the match of the day between France and Brazil is that Les Bleues skipper Wendie Renard is fit to start after overcoming an injury scare.
The defender played through an injury niggle in the 0-0 draw against Jamaica but is ready to face Brazil in this morning‚Äôs key Group F clash.
Brazil have made some changes, with Geyse and Debinha both starting.
France: Peyraud-Magnin, Perisset, Lakrar, Renard, Karchaoui, Toletti, Geyoro, Dali, Diani, Le Sommer, Bacha.
Subs: Durand, Fazer, de Almeida, Majri, Mateo, Tounkara, Le Garrec, Asseyi, Feller, Cascarino, Becho, Picaud.
Brazil: Leticia, Antonia, Lauren, Rafaelle, Tamires, Ary Borges, Kerolin, Luana, Adriana, Debinha, Geyse.
Subs: Barbara, Kathellen, Andressa, Ana Vitoria, Marta, Bruninha, Duda, Beatriz, Monica, Angelina, Gabi Nunes, Camila Gomes.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 4-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:54 , Jamie Braidwood
59 mins: This a pretty shambolic scoreline for Italy. The head coach Milena Bertolini needed a good World Cup after last summer‚Äôs disappointing group-stage exit at the Euros. This defeat does not end Italy‚Äôs hopes of reaching the last-16, but they will need to improve when they face South Africa in the final round.
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 4-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:41 , Jamie Braidwood
No let-off from Sweden! It‚Äôs ANOTHER goal from a corner! And it‚Äôs ANOTHER header from Ilestedt!
It comes from the right and Andersson‚Äôs delivery is once again superb, put into a dangerous area, and Ilestedt rises to head home her second of the game and Sweden‚Äôs fourth!
Ilestedt is now leading the golden boot race with three goals, along with Brazil‚Äôs Ary Borges.
Amanda Ilestedt is such an aerial danger üî•
She's now the joint-top scorer at #FIFAWWC - all from headers! ü§Ø#FIFAWWC #SWE #ITA pic.twitter.com/hO25uNdmhL‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 3-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:38 , Jamie Braidwood
45 mins: Back underway in Wellington - Sweden look set for the knockout stages, but can Italy mount a comeback?
HALF TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 3-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:27 , Jamie Braidwood
It‚Äôs raining goals in Wellington - those three from Sweden actually came within seven minutes and seven seconds.
The delivery from Jonna Andersson has been excellent.
Another Sweden corner üö©
Another Sweden goal ‚öΩ
Fridolina Rolfo the benefactor in the Italian box! #FIFAWWC #SWE #ITA pic.twitter.com/dhsxpzNgWh‚Äî BBC Sport (@BBCSport) July 29, 2023
HALF TIME! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 3-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:23 , Jamie Braidwood
Well that escalated quickly.
That was ruthless from Sweden. After an even first 20 minutes, Sweden come to life and turn the match around with three goals in six minutes. The opener from the corner changed the game, and Italy fell apart from there. Sweden are heading for the last-16.
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 3-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:18 , Jamie Braidwood
45 mins: WOW! A total collapse from Italy and Sweden surely have the match won now! Sweden get their third goal in six minutes - and this one isn‚Äôt from a corner. They fly forward down the right through Kaneryd, who cuts it back towards Rolfo. Amid the last-ditch challenges, the ball deflects in off Blackstenius!
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 2-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:16 , Jamie Braidwood
42 mins: Sweden strike again from the corner! It‚Äôs the same corner routine from the right, but this time it‚Äôs met by Fridolina Rolf√∂ at the back post! The Barcelona star bundles the ball into the back of the net, with Italy unable to clear off the line!
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 1-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:16 , Jamie Braidwood
41 mins: Chance! Durante saves Italy with a vital challange! Italy almost played themselves into danger with a back-pass, but Durante is quick off her line to slide on on Blackstenius as she tried to round the goalkeeper. That would have been an open goal... but Italy are able to clear for the corner.
GOAL! Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 1-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:12 , Jamie Braidwood
39 mins: Breakthrough for Sweden - and it‚Äôs Amanda Ilestedt again for Sweden! The match-winner against South Africa comes up with another big goal here against Italy. The defender rises highest in the box to meet Jonna Andersson‚Äôs inswinging corner, beating the Italy goalkeeper Durante to the cross. From there, it‚Äôs flicked deftly into the far corner. That‚Äôs just what Sweden needed.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 0-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:07 , Jamie Braidwood
33 mins: This has been a better spell from Sweden - but they are still not offering that much of a threat. Almost to sum it up, Blackstenius receives the ball after making the run down the channel and whips in the cross... only to find no one was there.
Sweden still with some figuring out to do.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 0-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 09:02 , Jamie Braidwood
27 mins: It took Sweden almost 25 minutes to get their first touches inside the Italy penalty box - but then comes a mad scramble in the area where Di Guglielmo is forced to make a key block in front of the goalline. From the corner, Durante has to punch away a dangerous inswinging cross. Better from Sweden.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 0-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 08:54 , Jamie Braidwood
22 mins: Sweden get their first effort on target as Rubensson catches a half-volley well from the edge of the box. Durante makes the comfortable save.
Women‚Äôs World Cup LIVE: Sweden 0-0 Italy
Saturday 29 July 2023 08:49 , Jamie Braidwood
17 mins: Chance! Cantore fires another snap-shot on target, trying to catch out Musovic at her near post. The Sweden goalkeeper spills, but is able to recover at the second attempt. Not the most convincing goalkeeping.
